description:
Watch New York band Been Stellar perform "Pumpkin" in The Current studio
Support The Current: https://support.mpr.org/youtube  

New York-based band Been Stellar have enjoyed an upward trajectory thanks to their own sheer hard work, ingenuity, and DIY spirit. On a visit to The Current, Been Stellar performed three songs from their latest album, "Scream From New York, NY," including the new single, "I Have The Answer." 

Watch a performance of "Pumpkin" above. 

Musicians
Samuel Slocum - vocals
Skyler Knapp - guitar/backing vox
Nicolas Brunstein - bass
Laila Wayans - drums
Harrison Li - guitar/backing vox

Credits
Guests – @beenstellar
Host – Ayisha Jaffer
Producer – Derrick Stevens
Video – Evan Clark
Audio – Josh Sauvageau
Camera Operators – D'Vir Rudin, Evan Clark
Graphics – Natalia Toledo
Digital Producer – Luke Taylor

Subscribe to our channel:
http://www.youtube.com/user/893TheCurrent?sub_confirmation=1

title: Been Stellar – Pumpkin (live for The Current)
